findings.title: Skill does not specify a license
findings.description: Skill manifest does not include a 'license' field. Specifying a license helps users understand usage terms.
findings.remediation: Add 'license' field to SKILL.md frontmatter (e.g., MIT, Apache-2.0)

findings.title: Skill declares no Write tool but bundled scripts write files
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['Bash', 'Read', 'Glob', 'Grep'] but bundled scripts appear to write to the filesystem, which conflicts with a read-only tool declaration.
findings.remediation: Either add 'Write' to allowed-tools (if intentional) or remove filesystem writes from scripts

findings.title: Python scripts present but Python tool not in allowed-tools
findings.description: Skill restricts tools to ['Bash', 'Read', 'Glob', 'Grep'] but includes Python scripts
findings.remediation: Add 'Python' to allowed-tools or remove Python scripts

findings.title: Suspicious URL detected: https://json.schemastore.org/sarif-2.1.0.json
findings.description: Script contains suspicious URL that may be used for data exfiltration
findings.remediation: Review URL and ensure it's legitimate and documented
